channel.title: Few questions
channel.description:
hello and thx or reading
question 1: can you change the background of the client. so insted of the cars i can put my own picture?
question 2: could some one post the codes of commands example ( dragon) gives you full dragon and a whip? somthing like that
question 3: and could some one post commands, so when i attack a monster i dies not jsut stands there?
question 4: if you can how do u get rid of "nulls" in ur server like can you delete them?
thank you if you can help me[br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2007, 08:28:35 PM[/size][hr]can any one help me?? :eek: :confused: :|

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

1; Class 30 Sub 2 Sub 1 Sub 1 (I think).

2; It would be easier to do this server sided.

3; Server sided; Ask in help section.

4; Item nulls must either be added in place for a proper items.
